@RepJohnConyers was a civil rights pioneer & progressive giant. He led the MLK holiday bill reparations and universal single-payer healthcare. A founding member of the @TheBlackCaucus he was a wise mentor to me and many others. I will miss him greatly. @CBCFInc https://t.co/UCnU8ndhQh

@realDonaldTrump has admittedly betrayed our country’s campaign finance laws acknowledged betraying his oath of office and thus betrayed our Constitution. @POTUS has damaged our national security. His betrayal demands imposition of drastic action by Congress: #ImpeachTrump

“Our safety our liberty depends upon preserving the Constitution of the U.S. The people of the U.S. are the rightful masters of both Congress and the courts not to overthrow the Constitution but to overthrow of the men who pervert the Constitution.” -President Lincoln.
President Trump has repeatedly obstructed justice and blatantly disrespected his oath of office. Enough is enough! It is time to move forward on Impeachment. https://t.co/97j5Ww4LH2
